message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a valuable item. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll appreciate its worth. I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $1100000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you have a budget in mind, but I'm afraid $900000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1000000. This is a compromise that I think is reasonable, considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to propose a price of $950000. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $980000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to propose a price of $950000 again, as I believe it's a fair price for the product's value to me. I'm not willing to go any higher.
